column1: Nabire Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara Nabire) (IATA: NBX
column2: ICAO: WABI) is an airport in Nabire Regency
column3: Indonesia. The Nabire Airport is located right in the middle of the town
column4: with the city center just a few hundred meters away. The airport provides safe and secure short term and long term parking for your vehicle during your trip. The operation of the Airport is managed by UPT Ditjen Hubud
column5: an agency under Ministry of Transportation
column6: Indonesia. Flight Destinations Nabire Airport is served by few local airlines such as Garuda Indonesia
column7: Express Air and Susi Air with Jayapura and Biak are the most popular routes. Airline Name Destination Express Air Jayapura Garuda Indonesia Biak
column19: Waghete Trigana Air Service Jayapura Wings Air Ambon
column22: civil transport cars and motorcycle taxi can be used as public transport to city center. Taxi are available outside the arrival hall. Technical Specification The airport resides at an elevation of 6 m (20 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 18/36 with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column24: 593 ft) in length. Contact Information Jl. Sisingamangaraja PO Box 115
